author: Special Correspondent
text:
Bannari Amman Institute of Technology, Sathyamangalam, is organising the ‘DST Inspire Internship camp’ from February 23 to February 27 on the Bannari Amman Institute premises.

The camp is sponsored by Department of Science and Technology, Government of India. A total of 100 students, currently pursuing XI selected from 30 different schools, will participate in the programme.

The science camp will be addressed by various academic fellows including Bhatnagar Awardees and Scientists of National and International repute, according to a release.
title: DST Inspire science camp at BIT
